Architect and urban designer who dived into the world of digital creation. Currently working with tech startup founders, engineers, and designers to create websites, mobile Apps, and brand identity.

Hi I'm Yishan

I was born in China and spent my adult life in New York and the Bay area. I went to school for architecture and urban design but started to grow an interest in product design through talking to people and the internet. You can find me in the gym, dancing and spoiling my two cats outside of work.

As an architect I designed
2022

Southeast Community Center

Design, Construction & Project Management

As one of the major projects I worked on at the City of San Francisco, I was involved in the design, construction administration and project management of the Southeast Community Center in India Basin neighborhood in San Francisco. The project will complete in May 2022.
